[Between the Scales](/Feats.aspx?ID=1279) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Underestimating you is a grave mistake, but it's one others keep making. You've learned to take advantage of slips in your foes' defenses. When you Strike a [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creature using a melee weapon or unarmed attack that has the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170) and [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) traits, it gains the [backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172) trait.
